subject: Upcomming Lessons for Lexi
body:
Lexi Lesson Plan: Tue Nov 21, 2023 at 07:00 PM

Lexi is going to get a Christmas song. If y'all have any requests, then I am up to hear them...

If nobody had any other requests, it'll be 'Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer'.

Also, frosty the snowman might be an option... It's a little bit difficult as far as chords, but Lexi has had success with that sort of thing, and seems to enjoy that aspect.

We will talk about it.


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:

  • Email: ggoadmusic@gmail.com
  • Phone: 336-406-1319
